articles.description: HEALTH-CORONAVIRUS/AUSTRALIA (UPDATE 2, TV, PIX, GRAPHIC):UPDATE 2-Australia sees biggest daily rise in COVID-19 cases in two months
articles.content:
Slideshow by photo services
* 75 new cases of virus in Victoria state, 85 nationally
* Victoria says fresh restrictions may be necessary
